titles.title: Combating Counterfeit Pharmaceuticals Act of 2025
Combating Counterfeit Pharmaceuticals Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Fentanyl Sanctions Act to address trafficking of copy-cat and counterfeit drugs and active pharmaceutical ingredients, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
